text:
John Rogers Galvin (May 13, 1929 – September 25, 2015) was an American army general. He served as the sixth dean of the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy at Tufts University. He was a member of the 21st Century. He was born in Wakefield, Massachusetts.
Galvin died in Jonesboro, Georgia, aged 86.

annotations.surface_form: Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy
